context: I'm in the mood to see a fantasy movie, something that my 11-year old can watch with me. Do you have any ideas? We've seen Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002) together and liked it.

resp: Also The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (2012) is also great to see as well.
